Financials (Q4FY25 ending March 31, 2025):

Revenue:₹820.77 crore.

Profit After Tax (PAT):₹249.60 crore.

Active Annual Recurring Revenue (ARR) AUM:Declined 0.5% QoQ to ₹2.47 trillion.

Active ARR Net Inflows:₹39.9 billion (vs. ₹66.4 billion in Q3FY25).

Net Inflows (FY25):₹260 billion (in line with guidance).

Wealth Management ARR AUM:₹1.63 trillion (flat QoQ).

Business Developments:

Employee attrition:Some RMs (Relationship Managers) left in the preceding 4-5 months, leading to AUM loss in wealth management.

Outlook:Management expected ARR flow guidance for FY26 to be similar to FY25 (10-15% of opening active ARR AUM).

Board Meeting:A meeting of the Board of Directors was scheduled for April 23, 2025, to consider and approve the financial results for the quarter and fiscal year ended March 31, 2025, the first interim dividend for FY26, and fund-raising plans.

CRISIL:Reaffirmed ratings on May 2, 2025.
